entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
